verbs.description: [ARG0: hand dryers] [V: suck] in [ARG1: fecal bacteria] and blow it all over your hands study finds fecal bacteria shoots into the air each time a lidless toilet is flushed then that air gets sucked up rapidly and shot onto your hands when you dry them with an air dryer peter setlow university of connecticut health center hand bacteria newsweek
